hero.title: Your affirmations, finally stuck in your head.
hero.description: Affirmetry turns classic “I am” statements into science-backed musical earworms, so your favorite affirmations keep replaying in your mind all day—without extra effort.

problemSolution.problemTitle: If your affirmations fade by lunchtime, it’s not your fault.
problemSolution.problemIntro: Classic apps send you beautiful lines like “I am worthy”. You feel better for a moment—until stress comes back. The problem isn’t the affirmation. It’s how your brain stores it.

problemCards.title: Scroll & Forget
problemCards.description: You read dozens of affirmations daily but can't remember one in a stressful moment. Text rarely makes it to long-term memory.

problemCards.title: Generic & Disconnected
problemCards.description: Recycled lines look good on Instagram but don't feel personal enough to change deep beliefs about money or love.

problemCards.title: All Vibe, No Science
problemCards.description: Without a mechanism for neuroplasticity, 'manifesting' feels like magic. You need a way to actually rewire the brain.

problemSolution.solutionTitle: Meet Affirmetry: The musical affirmation app.
problemSolution.solutionIntro: Affirmetry takes the affirmations you already believe in—self-love, confidence, abundance—and delivers them through specially composed songs engineered to become earworms.

solutionBullets.title: Classic Content, New Format
solutionBullets.description: “I am” statements about love, money, body—now as catchy tracks.

solutionBullets.title: The Earworm Effect
solutionBullets.description: Designed so phrases resurface in your mind while you shower or walk.

solutionBullets.title: Science-backed, not “woo-woo”
solutionBullets.description: Built on neuroplasticity and Involuntary Musical Imagery (INMI).

solutionBullets.title: Effortless Practice
solutionBullets.description: No journaling, no long meditations. Just press play.

science.label: The Science
science.title: Not magic. Mechanics.
science.description: Why singing your affirmations works better than just reading them. Our research shows that musical messages activate more of the brain and are remembered 3x better.
science.chartNote: Simplified representation of multi-modal learning efficacy.

bullets.title: Earworm Engine (INMI)
bullets.description: Your brain naturally loops melodies. Affirmetry 'hijacks' this loop so instead of replaying worries, your brain replays 'I am capable'.

bullets.title: Whole-Brain Encoding
bullets.description: Reading uses the left hemisphere. Music + Lyrics engage the whole brain, including emotional and motor centers, creating durable memories.

bullets.title: Female Stickiness Advantage
bullets.description: Studies show women experience longer-lasting earworms. Musical affirmations are biologically optimized for our core audience.

items.question: Is this just another affirmation app?
items.answer: It looks familiar on the surface—but under the hood, Affirmetry uses neuroscience and music science to make affirmations stick in memory far more effectively than simple text notifications.

items.question: Do I need to stop using my current affirmation app?
items.answer: No. Many users keep their favorite app for quotes and use Affirmetry as the audio “installation” layer—turning key phrases into earworm tracks.

items.question: How long before I notice changes?
items.answer: Some users feel different after a few days; most notice a shift in self-talk within 2–3 weeks of regular listening (5–15 minutes a day).

items.question: Is this therapy?
items.answer: No. Affirmetry is not a medical treatment or a substitute for therapy. It’s a self-help and wellness tool designed to support your emotional well-being and mindset.
